#summary Use case for updating an existing Lexicon entry.
#labels Phase-Design,UseCase

= Introduction =

*Description:*

Updates a Lexicon entry in the database.

*Preconditions:*
 # The user has the role of Administrator.
 # The user is logged into the administration interface.
 # The user is viewing the Update Lexicon page.

*Postconditions:*
 # The selected Lexicon entry will be updated with the entered text.

= Basic Course of Action =

 # User wants to update a Lexicon entry.
 # User selects the Update option for the chosen entry.
 # User enters a new internationalized text value for the Lexicon entry.
 # User submits the form.
 # The system verifies that a Lexicon with the selected language, topic, and key exist in the database.
 # The system updates the value field of the entry in the database.
 # The system deletes the Lexicon cache file for the language and topic.
 # The system displays a success page to the user.
 # Use case ends.
